title: Ticket #3766: vanilla ImageSize not being updated in startd while job runs
description:
In our pool, ImageSize doesn't appear to be updated in the startd job while the job is running, even though I can see updates in the userlog and ResidentSetSize is updated.

This can be most clearly demonstrated by "condor_status -const 'Imagesize < ResidentSetSize'" which returns lots of results.
remarks:
2013-Jul-15 11:31:44 by johnkn:
in CHTC 
condor_status -const 'ImageSize < ResidentSetSize'
returns no results, although the reason may be because none of the machine ads have ResidentSetSize defined.

2013-Jul-24 15:51:44 by pfc:
You just need to add ResidentSetSize to STARTD_JOB_EXPRS (so the latest value from the job ad will be published in the machine ad), and you'll be able to see the issue.

2013-Jul-25 10:00:24 by pfc:
You can also verify this without ResidentSetSize at all by submitting a job that steadily consumes more memory, and observe that ImageSize remains constant until the job is vacated; it's just a little more work.
creator: pfc
